content: Hello! I recently updated to the VSCode extension v0.2.481 and syntax highlight is no longer working. Here's the debug output https://gist.github.com/Lindenk/756f3e62439f1ff1213e3a78360d2dbe. All features are enabled, I've also tried explicitly enabling the syntax_highlighting feature. Is there something I'm missing?
You may want to post in #t-compiler/wg-rls-2.0.
Is it in every file? Are you missing a mod?
It doesn't seem to be highlighting the main.rs file in a default project (or any .rs file in any project)
Please file an issue. There's nothing obviously wrong in your log.
Maybe I removed the 'flickering' workaround too soon (though it is fixed in our version of vscode-languageclient). It's possible that tokens aren't being re-requested when they should.
